title: Checkers AI
description: Implemented the recursive Minimax Search Tree algorithm Python to develop an intelligent Checkers program, making it virtually unbeatable against a player making random moves. Designed a UI visualizing the choices and performance of the AI algorithm using pygame

title: Wealth & Wellbeing - Research Paper
description: Utilized Python pandas and statistical analysis to produce a research paper on the relationship between wealth and well-being.

title: Fantasy Basketball Project
description:
Java-based web application enabling users to create and track custom basketball teams and compete in
virtual matchups, by leveraging an NBA API for dynamic data integration and real-time updates.
